language.entry: Blood and mud...
A man in a uniform has shown up in the hamlet, ready to command the troops against the tides of Eldritch horror.
Je n'ai plus rien à offrir...
Sweet oblivion awaits...
Jusqu'à la mort...
C'était un faux-pas !
Il n'y a pas de gloire ici, seulement la mort !
Repli !
Maudits traîtres, tous autant que vous êtes !
Les déserteurs remplissent les rangs...
Graines de dissidence...
Le sang est le prix de la victoire.
It is in the crucible of war that greatness is made.
Un homme qui n'a rien peut quand même donner sa vie.
Fear me, but follow!
Failure does not allow for explanation.
Je suis un commandant. C'est mon travail d'envoyer des hommes à la mort !
La gloire est gâchée par les inglorious.
Je suis le seul à maintenir les rangs ici !
C'est ma victoire, pas la vôtre !
La pluie lavera tout, la boue et le sang.
Des milliers de batailles, celle-ci signera-t-elle ma fin ?
Nous sommes entrés dans un piège mortel, il n'y a pas d'échappatoire !
J'aime l'odeur de la poudre à canon dès le matin !
Je ne vois rien sous ce casque !
Je demande un armistice ! Où dois-je signer ?
Je suis la tempête !
Encerclés ? Bien, ça veut dire qu'on peut tirer dans toutes les directions !
Come you dogs, do you want to live forever?
I shall make heroes of you all!
Duty calls! We answer!
I will strike swift and true.
I see the battlefield with clarity now.
War is chaos. I shall adapt to it, not fight it.
Enemies of the empire, you have come here to die!
By my will, it shall be done!
Retreat is not an option!
We are not dead yet!
I have survived worse and have the medals to prove it.
Rise, soldier, we march again!
This reminds me of Bruslov's Breakthrough.
Glory is eternal!
Victory is assured.
They shall make monuments of this fight!
No hesistation! No fear!
Failure is a weakness of the enemy.
Tactic is the great equalizer!
Keep firing till the barrel glows red!
Glory to the heroic! CHARGE!
Alright men, time to wage war!
Left! Left! Left, right, left!
Strike hard! Strike true!
Scars are just battles that you have survived.
Come, give me another a medal!
Victory is within arms reach, it would be a shame to fall now.
The mud beckons...
I hear the march of a thousand feet...
They are preparing a coup de grace...
Did they send me robbers and thieves instead of soldiers?
You conspire against your country!
I will not suffer cowards and deserters in my ranks.
The fields of war must be watered with blood.
Blood and gunpowder, this brings me back...
A open wound is a medal by another name.
Discipline are built on fear and punishment!
Fear ensures loyalty.
Forward, you dogs.
Glory hounds here to steal my glory?
You are not worth my time.
I alone shall claim this victory.
There is no mercy in their eyes.
Forgive me, for I have failed.
Another meaningless death for a meaningless cause.
Right, men, the enemy cannot kill you if you kill yourself.
Someone really ought to mark which end is the barrel end.
Look, I'm sure if I did the exact same thing that we did the last thirty fights, things will be different this time.
A commander's place is not at the front!
You, hold the line, I shall find a way to retreat.
This will not be my grave!
You plan to sacrifice me? Not today!
The traitorous dogs should be at the front
I will not have knives plunged in my back!
The only order worth remembering is CHARGE!
If you will not move, then I shall be the first into the breach!
One cannot understand war unless one has personally wet their blade in it.
An unexpected move.
My tactics are beyond your comprehension.
War is chaos, here, let me demonstrate.
Have you tried rolling out of the way?
I seem to have slipped...
Frontline, back line, where's left line and right line?
Let's get this over with.
I see their faces still, beckoning me to join them.
A commander should be with his men, even in the grave.
What's the use?
My strength falters, I am of no use on the frontline.
A cowardly tragedy for a coward.
Make way, I must make my name known in this battle!
Out of my way, your are blocking my sight.
This is how wars are won.
Out of my way, you are hampering my strategy.
A veteran should be in the back, like the triarii of old.
The fodders shall be the one to take the blow.
The situation has changed. I need time to rethink the battleplan.
Perhaps the only winning move is not to move at all?
This has gotten out of hand, I need a minute.
I am surrounded by enemies, I can not move.
I will not reveal my plans, lest spies get a hold of them.
This is a trap! I will not do as you say!
Do not presume to command me!
I am your superior.
Welps do not give orders to their superiors.
My feet sinks into the mud.
I am but a feast for the rats.
Why do we even fight? What's the meaning of all of this?
No, I shall stand right here instead.
A command? From who?
No really this thing has no peripheral vision at all.
Unpredictability is the enemy of all traps and ambush.
Every man for himself!
This is the only way I can be safe.
The sprits of this battlefield guide me.
No plans this time, only blood.
The chaos of battle is the greatest dance of all!
My plans are beyond your comprehension.
Must I do everything myself?
Behold!
Out of my way!
This is the path of my victory!
You plebians would not understand what a stroke of military genius this is.
The ghosts of my comrades beckon me.
Maybe this will hasten the end.
Doubt clouds my aim.
Look, all I'm saying is that this has never been tried before!
I don't know why, but I feel like this will work.
Oh look, a rat!
Behind the enemy lines is a dangerous place to be.
Our supplies are running low.
The rats wais for their meals in the darkness.
If I wake up dead, you all know who did it.
My area is off limit to everyone.
Asleep in a nest of vipers...
Oh what are we stopping for? Battle awaits!
While we dally here, the war goes on!
I do not fear a glorious death, only a peaceful passing my sleep.
I will have you all sent back to the training camp once this is over.
Ah yes, a camp, why don't you hang up a sign that say "Please ambush us" already?
I am surprised some of you even made it this far.
Let me sleep, at least one of us needs to have a clear mind in this hell.
One of you should clean my medals.
Bah, back in the day I would not have to share tent with these rabble.
The only respite before battle starts again.
Tomorrow we fight again. There is no escape.
Even the flame flickers in the mud.
Does anyone else have chocolate in their rations?
The wires says they want a pet.
Now how do I eat with this thing on...
I shall wear my scars with pride and invite more!
I am here! Come and give me a fight!
I have red feather on my hat, you cannot miss it!
From dust to dust.
Strike me, redeem my failure with death.
Spare the others, I alone am responsible for this failure.
I propose a dance off instead of war!
I hereby formally invite you to a duel!
These medals are bulletproof, here, let me show you.
The punishment for disloyalty is flogging.
You will redeem your treasonous thoughts with blood.
Let this be an example for the rest of you.
The punishment for incompetence is death!
If you will not serve with duty, then you shall serve with fear.
Forward, you dogs, forward or I will put you down myself.
Safety's on, trust me.
You bleed funny!
What's a little fratricide between friends eh?
Pain clears the mind and opens it up to new possibilities.
I shall bleed as my men has bled for me.
I shall have first blood!
No prisoners for me.
War is hell.
I shan't lead another to ruin again.
I think I loaded a blank in here by mistake
*grabs barbed wire*
Blood for blood!
Retreats are for traitors and deserters!
Stand your ground or I will have you trialed and shot!
The punishment for deserter is death!
It is sweet and noble to die for one's country.
And live to fight another day? No, I have fought enough.
Death calls for me here, gun in hand.
I have not have my fill yet!
There is more blood to shed!
Discretion is a coward's excuse. Forward!
That path is mined!
What's the point of dying over there if we can die over here instead?
*held in place by barbed wire*
They are coming for me!
They are attempting a decapitation strike.
I don't want to die like this!
Who pushed me? Was it you?
Do not mistake my wound for weakness, you curs.
And none of you thought to warn me?
They know their priority target!
I better get a medal for this!
Without me this army is like a headless chicken.
Weak!
Your steel are no match for my will!
Bloodied steel always hunger for more!
Oooh I ned a shot of morphine for that!
You hit like a train carrying other, smaller, trains!
Is this how you people greet diplomats?
Luck always runs out eventually...
Too close.
A stray bullet away from death.
They know our weakness. They must have insider knowledges.
The formation has a flaw?
Feigned vulnerability?
This is war, not a playground for childrens with sticks!
If you can hear the bullet it means it didn't hit you yet!
They deny us a good fight!
Have you tried aiming?
I see you are aiming for the barn instead.
Must have been the winds.
Passable.
I would have killed them instead.
You dare steal my kill?
Basic competency.
What, do you want a medal for doing your job?
Did I say fire?
Okay now shoot the blood too!
Shoot the white of their eyes out!
What a loud weapon!
Stay in cover. Next time you won't be so lucky
Death and life decided by a single coinflip!
Beware the shrapnel too!
You are in league with them!
Sparing their own spies, I see.
You are in collusion with them!
You will find that I do not suffer the inadequate aim of the enemy.
You are not getting off that easily!
Do not shirk your duty to die!
They show you mercy and not me?
Merely luck, not skills!
Luck wasted on you!
Lambs to the slaughter!
Keep your heads down!
Another one falls!
Let this be a lesson to you!
Barely a wound!
A fitting end for heroes.
A fool's error.
I feel sorry for the others who have to deppend upon you.
At least you are good for taking the blow.
Flowers for all!
A pint of blood for a fountain of gold.
What a strange technique.
Our weapons are malfunctioning!
We can't get a bead on them!
They move like shadows over the hills.
Do not play coy, I know of your tricks and your feigned surprises.
Someone sabotaged our armaments?
Explain your failures or risk my wrath!
And say farewell to that arm!
Try shooting with your legs!
Don't trip now!
Moving out of cover now is suicide.
They are waiting for us to move. Do not!
We're stranded here!
I will not take my eyes off them even for a second.
You would like that, would you? Seeing me march to my death?
I am in range and you are telling me to move?
No, we shall make our stand here and now!
And miss the war? No, of course not!
My blood marks my spot already.
And leave the battle plan in the hand of these idiots? I think not.
A disorganize move can soon turn into a route!
I will move when I want to!
Poisoned, I'm sure.
A trap masquerading as a gift.
You rigged this to explode didn't you?
A true warrior does not need a crutch!
I will not dull my mind with these things.
I shall shed blood with my own two hands.
I am unworthy of aid.
Save the supplies for the others.
Reserve for those who will not die.
*drops it on the ground*
Yes but why does it have to contain snakes?
Not now, I'm busy drawing!
A hand holding a scalpel is a hand holding a knife
A plot to get me to reveal my weaknesses.
I need no morphine.
On the edge of death is where the warrior shines.
No mercy for me. Not yet.
Toughen up, you lot, the worst is yet to come.
Do not waste your healing on me.
Heal not the damned.
I am already a deadman walking.
Can you treat my wire too?
I can't even feel my face let alone find my veins.
It taste funny.
A helping hand hides a dagger in the back.
I do not trust untested soldiers.
I need no advices from those untrained in the art of war.
The strongests are strongest alone.
And share my glory? Never!
This victory will be purchased with my own blood!
Unworthy...
Do not put your hopes on me...
I do not understand.
Your words are like noises to me.
What price did you pay for this?
Victory, purchased with blood!
Another number in the count!
Death and Glory!
The enemy falters. Keep up the assault!
Break their ranks!
Glory to the first man to die!
The end of days is upon them!
Doubt is for the dying.
There is no glory without a little hardship.
We're all brothers in arms here.
Fire forges the greatest of camraderie.
This is going to hurt a bit but it's good for you.
A bandage should be tight and clean.
Let me dig out the bullet.
Heroes are born of times like this.
I carry with me a flash of the finest whiskey for occassions such as these.
Think of the songs will they will write about our battles.
Blood and mud...
Burry me with my men.
Once more, into that dark night.
Leave me to my plans!
Anything I say might bring us further into defeat.
Defeat fills my mind and body.
This is confidential information, not to be revealed.
I will not help traitors!
My secret will die with me if needs be.
Some lessons must be learned by trials and error.
Who needs plans? Things never goes according to them anyway
War is simple. Make the enemy bleed more than you. Nothing more.
You do not have the right to demand anything of me!
My instructions requires basic competence to follow
The only cure for cowardice is a bullet!
Do not waste my time on the non-estential.
My skills are mine alone!
You have not earned these lessons of wars.
I can't think of anything to say anymore.
Abandon hope...
The shells never stopped...
Im sorry but your subscription does cover this.
Sticks and stones may break my bones but together they can cause even greater harm!
How about a game of speed chess instead?
The gall to try this to my face!
Smuggled instructions from our enemies, no doubt.
I alone knows the ways of war.
Leave me be, adversity foster inspiration.
The flesh must be allowed to scar over to become stronger.
I need no help!
Spare me the details of your incompetence.
Is that what you can muster?
Do not presume that you have authority over me.
Perhaps I am cursed to always lead men to their death. Keep your distance from me.
There's no point. I am doomed.
Your hoes are misplaced on me.
Right but do you have the proper documentation?
Only orders from the High Command would do!
*blankly stares forward*
The bread is tainted with cyanide, I can smell it.
A full stomach dulls the eyes, so the dagger can strike unseen.
A craven's attempt.
I shall eat when the enemies are all dead.
Food taste like ashes when one have tasted the din of battle.
A hungry animal fights the hardest.
Its always bread.
Sustenance are wasted on the dying.
Precious resources should be saved for the others.
I prefer the taste of mud cake.
Ah, but one needs cuterly for these.
This is not food, this is a rock!
Facing the lead again.
Live again...Charge again...Die again.
Pour la patrie !
Pas encore, soldats, pas aujourd'hui !
Je vous ordonne de survivre !
Ce n'est pas un lieu pour mourir !
De retour du bord du gouffre apte à commander !
L'homme mort revient et tous craindront son courroux.
Back into the breach!
Commandant
Pistolet d'Officier
Coup de Fouet
Terrain périlleux
Stranglethorn
{colour_start|yes_target_fre} ¤¦¤¦¤¦¤{colour_end} Rallier les Troupes
{colour_start|yes_target_fre} ¤ ¤ ¤ ¤{colour_end} Étreinte de Fer

{colour_start|yes_target_fre} ¤ ¤ ¤ ¤{colour_end} Au cœur de la brèche

{colour_start|notable}Action Gratuite{colour_end}
Cible: Avancée 1
RETOUR AU FRONT
THÉORIE DE LA DOMINANCE ÉCLAIR
PRINCIPE DE LA GUERRE D'USURE
PRÉPARATION LOGISTIQUE
La ligne de front ou la ligne de tir. Choisissez.
Saisir l'initiative, déstabiliser, et enfin vaincre !
If we can outlast them, we can outfight them.
Une armée marche à l'estomac.
Produit 6 Nourriture
Produit 1 Pelle
Produit 3 Torches
Pistolet d'Officier
À Mon Commandement !
{?string1}%s Si HP de la cible en dessous de {?percent1}%d%%
Cible: {colour_start|mark}Marque{colour_end} Target (20%% Chance)
Cible: {colour_start|blight}Infection{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(140%% Base){colour_end}
3 pts/tr sur 3 trs

%d%% Random Friendly Target Chance
Pistolet à Fusées Éclairantes
Pistolet du Commissaire
Obus Chimiques
Poster de Recrutement
Obus Antibunker
Médaille du Service
Drapeau Teinté
Plan de Bataille Incompréhensible
"Charge Again. Die Again."
Fil de Fer Improvisé
Fil de Fer Barbelé
Fil de Fer Barbelé Concertina
Fil de Fer Barbelé à Lames de Rasoir
"La Ligne Rouge"
Fil de Fer Ensorcelé
Nouveau Manteau
Manteau Adapté au Combat
Manteau d'Officier
Manteau de Parade
"The Price of Glory Verdun 1916"
Manteau de Commissaire
Planification des opérations

L'information, exploitée judicieusement, est plus mortelle que n'importe quelle lame ou pistolet. Grâce à une connaissance approfondie du terrain et à un plan de bataille minutieux, la victoire n'est qu'une affaire de détails.

Forgé dans le sang et la boue de la guerre, le Commandant a remporté un grand nombre de victoires et a subit autant de défaites cuisantes, ce qui lui a procuré le savoir-faire stratégique nécessaire pour bouleverser à lui-seul un champ de bataille complet. Faisant plier les hommes par ses mots et l'acier par sa volonté, le Commandant mène une guerre sans merci, inspirant à ses alliés à la fois crainte et respect, et emportant tout opposant sous le feu de l'artillerie et des fils barbelés.

Bien qu'il se distingue par son casque et son képi d'officier, le Commandant continue de revêtir le même uniforme que ses soldats, dissimulé par ses décorations. Éprouvé au combat et porté en permanence, ce vêtement procure une protection efficace contre les balles perdues et les éclats d'obus, tout en conservant un niveau de liberté de mouvement appréciable, le rendant adapté à toutes les situations qui peuvent se présenter sur le champ de bataille.

Les guerres sont rarement remportées en une seule bataille, et le Commandant se concentre donc sur une vue d'ensemble, transmettant ses connaissances inestimables en stratégie et en logistique. Lorsque, malheureusement, certains se soustraient aux devoirs de la guerre, le Commandant est là pour les rappeler au combat par tous les moyens nécessaires.
